body_html: @mrry I see. I can send a PR to grpc to add //external:zlib as a dependency of grpc++_unsecure which they already did for grpc target. Then we bind @zlib_archive//:zlib as zlib in workspace.bzl. This should make us easier to switch back later.
body_text: @mrry I see.  I can send a PR to grpc to add //external:zlib as a dependency of grpc++_unsecure which they already did for grpc target. Then we bind @zlib_archive//:zlib as zlib in workspace.bzl. This should make us easier to switch back later.
body: @mrry I see.  I can send a PR to grpc to add `//external:zlib` as a dependency of `grpc++_unsecure` which [they already did for `grpc` target](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/commit/f2f24e2f93bba8ae939beb53980ac8e042c372c0). Then we bind `@zlib_archive//:zlib` as `zlib` in `workspace.bzl`. This should make us easier to switch back later.
